DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , observational study evaluate use clinical practice efficacy RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) patient rheumatoid arthritis . Eligible patient initiated RoActemra/Actemra treatment accord approve label follow 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis , accord revise ACR criterion Patients initiate RoActemra/Actemra treatment ( accordance local label ) treat physician decision RoActemra/Actemra treatment 8 week prior enrolment visit Previous RoActemra/Actemra treatment clinical trial compassionate use Treatment investigational agent within 4 week ( 5 halflives investigational agent , whichever long ) start treatment RoActemra/Actemra History autoimmune disease joint inflammatory disease RA
